segment.source: How to Create a Virtual Environment for a Web-Based Application
segment.target: How to Create a Virtual Environment for a Web-Based Application

segment.source: How to Create a Virtual Environment for a Web-Based Application
segment.target: How to Create a Virtual Environment for a Web-Based Application

segment.source: How to Create a Virtual Environment for a Web-Based Application
segment.target: How to Create a Virtual Environment for a Web-Based Application

segment.source: You can create separate virtual environments for web applications you want to isolate.
segment.target: You can create separate virtual environments for web applications you want to isolate.

segment.source: Creating separate web environments is useful if the web-based applications require plug-ins of have configurations that conflict with each other.
segment.target: Creating separate web environments is useful if the web-based applications require plug-ins of have configurations that conflict with each other.

segment.source: To create a virtual environment for a Web-based application
segment.target: To create a virtual environment for a Web-based application

segment.source: For more information about sequencing an application see How to Sequence a New Application.
segment.target: For more information about sequencing an application see How to Sequence a New Application.

segment.source: On the Monitor Installation page, to start monitoring the installation of the application, click Begin Monitoring.
segment.target: On the Monitor Installation page, to start monitoring the installation of the application, click Begin Monitoring.

segment.source: Open a web browser and navigate to the installer file associated with the application.
segment.target: Open a web browser and navigate to the installer file associated with the application.

segment.source: Install the application, and perform any required post installation configuration tasks.
segment.target: Install the application, and perform any required post installation configuration tasks.

segment.source: To ensure the applications starts, open the application three times.
segment.target: To ensure the applications starts, open the application three times.

segment.source: Install and configure any additional applications that need to reside in the same virtual environment.
segment.target: Install and configure any additional applications that need to reside in the same virtual environment.

segment.source: Complete the remainder of the Sequencing Wizard.
segment.target: Complete the remainder of the Sequencing Wizard.

segment.source: To save the application, select File, and click Save.
segment.target: To save the application, select File, and click Save.

segment.source: Tasks for the Application Virtualization Sequencer
segment.target: Tasks for the Application Virtualization Sequencer
